title: K P Sharma Oli Sworn In As Nepal's New Prime Minister
content: K P Sharma Oli on Monday was sworn in as Nepal's Prime Minister for the fourth time.
summary: K P Sharma Oli on Monday was sworn in as Nepal's Prime Minister for the fourth time.

title: 30 Hours Since Trump Survives Assassination Bid, Hunt Continues For Motive
content: Over 30 hours after a bullet pierced Donald Trump's ear at a rally ahead of the US' biggest election, the motive behind the high-profile assassination attempt remains unknown.
summary: Over 30 hours after a bullet pierced Donald Trump's ear at a rally ahead of the US' biggest election, the motive behind the high-profile assassination attempt remains unknown.

title: AI Chip Demand Drives Taiwan Chipmaker's Second Quarter Profits Up By 30%
content: The world's largest contract chipmaker, whose customers include Apple and Nvidia, has benefited from a surge towards AI that has pushed TSMC's stock - and the broader Taiwan market - to record highs.
summary: The world's largest contract chipmaker, whose customers include Apple and Nvidia, has benefited from a surge towards AI that has pushed TSMC's stock - and the broader Taiwan market - to record highs.

title: Instagram Influencer, Who Trafficked Followers, Kept Them As Slaves, Jailed
content: Former Brazilian model and US-based wellness influencer Kat Torres has been sentenced to eight years in prison for the human trafficking and slavery of women, after an FBI investigation found that two women living with her had gone missing in 2022.
summary: Former Brazilian model and US-based wellness influencer Kat Torres has been sentenced to eight years in prison for the human trafficking and slavery of women, after an FBI investigation found that two women living with her had gone missing in 2022.

title: "I'm Supposed To Be Dead": Trump Recalls Rally Attack In Latest Interview
content: Former US president Donald Trump on Sunday told the New York Post he was "supposed to be dead" after surviving an assassination attempt which he described as a "very surreal experience."
summary: Former US president Donald Trump on Sunday told the New York Post he was "supposed to be dead" after surviving an assassination attempt which he described as a "very surreal experience."

title: Kate Middleton Gets Standing Ovation At Wimbledon Final In Rare Outing
content: Kate Middleton was greeted with a thunderous ovation as she entered the Royal Box at Centre Court, accompanied by her daughter Princess Charlotte.
summary: Kate Middleton was greeted with a thunderous ovation as she entered the Royal Box at Centre Court, accompanied by her daughter Princess Charlotte.

title: Trump Attacker Was Rejected By School Shooting Club Over "Terrible" Shot
content: Thomas Matthew Crooks was shot dead by law enforcement when he allegedly attempted to assassinate Donald Trump at a rally in Butler, Pennsylvania on Saturday.

title: Japanese AI Startup Turns Dating AI Into Reality
content: "Services like this app can remind people who are away from romance how delightful love is, and AI can train people to better communicate when talking with real partners," Megumi Ushikubo, CEO of Tokyo-based marketing firm Infinity Inc.

title: "Too Damn Perfect": Conspiracy Theories Surface After Trump Rally Shooting

title: Trump's Makeover To Convention Speech After Assassination Attempt
content: Donald Trump's convention speech will now focus on unity - and not aimed at President Joe Biden's policies - after the assassination attempt that he believes has changed the election discourse.

title: Political Implications Of Trump Assassination Bid For US Amid Uncertainty

title: FBI Probing Trump Rally Shooting As Potential "Domestic Terrorism" Act
content: The gunman who shot at former president Donald Trump during an election rally in Pennsylvania on Saturday appears to have acted alone, said the FBI, which is probing the incident as a potential "domestic terrorism" act.

title: "Something Triggered That...": What Trump Attacker's Former Teacher Said
content: The portrait pieced together so far of the 20-year-old nursing home aide who allegedly tried to assassinate Donald Trump at an election rally reveals frustratingly little about why he would make such an attempt - or how he managed to come so close.

title: Investment Giant BlackRock Pulls Ad Featuring Trump Rally Shooter

title: Global Markets Ramp Up The 'Trump Trade' After Assassination Attempt
